description: Classical Music - The Essential Collection features 50 of the finest Classical Masterpieces ever written. Definitely not to working to!
tag_list: Classical-Playlist Classical-Music Classical-Composers Best-Classical-Music Classical-Compilation Greatest-Classical-Hits Classical-Piano Instrumental-Music Relaxing-Music Classical-Songs Study-Music Dinner-Music Romantic-Music Background-Music Calming-Music Soothing-Music Mozart Debussy Grieg Satie Ravel Schubert Bizet Remixdj Beethoven Strauss Bach Chopin Liszt Tchaikovsky

tracks.tag_list: Nocturne Op.9 No.2 Remixdj "Music The Masters" Classical Music The Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Nocturne Op.9 - No.2
tracks.description:
The Nocturnes, Op. 9 are a set of three nocturnes written by Frédéric Chopin between 1830 and 1832, published that year, and dedicated to Madame Camille Pleyel. 

The second nocturne of the work is widely regarded as Chopin's most famous piece, and is regularly featured in films, television programs and video games.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Gymnopedie No1" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Erik Satie - Gymnopédie No.1
tracks.description:
The Gymnopédies, published in Paris starting in 1888, are three piano compositions written by French composer and pianist Erik Satie.

The melodies of the pieces use deliberate, but mild, dissonances against the harmony, producing a piquant, melancholy effect that matches the performance instructions, which are to play each piece "painfully", "sadly" or "gravely".

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Flower Duet" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Léo Delibes - Flower Duet
tracks.description:
"The Flower Duet" (French: Duo des fleurs / Sous le dôme épais) is a famous duet for sopranos from Léo Delibes' opera Lakmé, first performed in Paris in 1883. 

The duet takes place in act 1 of the three-act opera, between characters Lakmé, the daughter of a Brahmin priest, and her servant Mallika, as they go to gather flowers by a river.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Air on a G String" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: J.S. Bach - Air On The G String
tracks.description:
Air on the G String is August Wilhelmj's arrangement of the second movement in Johann Sebastian Bach's Orchestral Suite No. 3 in D major, BWV 1068.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Ave Maria" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Franz Schubert - Ave Maria
tracks.description:
Ave Maria has become one of Schubert's most popular works, recorded by a wide variety and large number of singers, under the title of Ave Maria, in arrangements with various lyrics which commonly differ from the original context of the poem. It was arranged in three versions for piano by Franz Liszt.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Infante Défunte Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Maurice Ravel - Pour Une Infante Défunte
tracks.description:
Pavane pour une infante défunte (Pavane for a Dead Princess) is a well-known piece written for solo piano by the French composer Maurice Ravel in 1899 when he was studying composition at the Conservatoire de Paris under Gabriel Fauré. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Elvira Madigan Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Mozart - Elvira Madigan
tracks.description:
Elvira Madigan, originally known as Piano Concerto No. 21, K 467,  is a three-movement concerto for piano and orchestra by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and is the best known of his many piano concerti. It was completed on March 9, 1785. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Classical Music Masters" Clair de Lune Classical Music The Essential Collection Remixdj
tracks.title: Claude Debussy - Clair De Lune
tracks.description:
The third and most famous movement of Suite bergamasque is "Clair de lune," meaning "moonlight" in French. Its name comes from Paul Verlaine's poem of the same name which also refers to 'bergamasques' in its opening stanza.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Carmen Suite No.2 Habanera Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Georges Bizet - Carmen Suite No.2 - Habanera
tracks.description:
Habanera is the popular name for the aria "L'amour est un oiseau rebelle" (Love is a rebellious bird) from Georges Bizet's 1875 opera Carmen. It is the entrance aria of the title character, a mezzo-soprano role, in scene 5 of the first act. The vocal range covers D4 to F♯5 with a tessitura from D4 to D5.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Moolight Sonata" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Ludvig Van Beethoven - Moolight Sonata
tracks.description:
The Piano Sonata No. 14 in C-sharp minor "Quasi una fantasia", Op. 27, No. 2, popularly known as the Moonlight Sonata, is a piano sonata by Ludwig van Beethoven. Completed in 1801 and dedicated in 1802 to his pupil, Countess Giulietta Guicciardi, it is one of Beethoven's most popular compositions for the piano.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Blue Danube" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Johann Strauss - Blue Danube
tracks.description:
The Blue Danube is a waltz by the Austrian composer Johann Strauss II, composed in 1866. Originally performed 15 February 1867 at a the Vienna Men's Choral Association, it has been one of the most consistently popular pieces of music in the classical repertoire. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Minute Waltz Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Minute Waltz
tracks.description:
The Waltz in D-flat major, Op. 64, No. 1, popularly known as the Minute Waltz, is a piano waltz composed by Frédéric Chopin. It is dedicated to the Countess Delfina Potocka.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Afternoon Faun Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Claude Debussy - Afternoon Of A Faun
tracks.description:
Prélude à l'après-midi d'un faune, known in English as Prelude to the Afternoon of a Faun, is a symphonic poem for orchestra by Claude Debussy, approximately 10 minutes in duration. It was first performed in Paris on December 22, 1894, conducted by Gustave Doret.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Eine Kleine Nachtmusik Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Mozart - Eine Kleine Nachtmusik - Allegro
tracks.description:
Eine kleine Nachtmusik is a 1787 composition for a chamber ensemble by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart. The German title means "a little serenade," though it is often rendered more literally but less accurately as "a little night music."

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Gymnopédie No.2 Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Erik Satie - Gymnopédie No.2
tracks.description:
These short, atmospheric pieces are written in 3/4 time, with each sharing a common theme and structure. Collectively, the Gymnopédies are regarded as an important precursor to modern ambient music. Gentle yet somewhat eccentric pieces which, when composed, defied the classical tradition.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Kinderszenen Träumerei Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Robert Schumann - Träumerei - Kinderszenen
tracks.description:
Kinderszenen (German pronunciation: original spelling Kinderscenen, "Scenes from Childhood"), Opus 15, by Robert Schumann, is a set of thirteen pieces of music for piano written in 1838. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj William Tell Overture Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Rossini & Liszt - William Tell Overture - No.1
tracks.description:
The William Tell Overture is the overture to the opera William Tell (original French title Guillaume Tell), whose music was composed by Gioachino Rossini. 

William Tell premiered in 1829 and was the last of Rossini's 39 operas, after which he went into semi-retirement, although he continued to compose cantatas, sacred music and secular vocal music. The overture is in four parts, each following without pause.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj William Tell Overture Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Rossini & Liszt - William Tell Overture - No.2
tracks.description:
The William Tell Overture is the overture to the opera William Tell (original French title Guillaume Tell), whose music was composed by Gioachino Rossini. 

William Tell premiered in 1829 and was the last of Rossini's 39 operas, after which he went into semi-retirement, although he continued to compose cantatas, sacred music and secular vocal music. The overture is in four parts, each following without pause.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj William Tell Overture Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Rossini & Liszt - William Tell Overture - No.3
tracks.description:
The William Tell Overture is the overture to the opera William Tell (original French title Guillaume Tell), whose music was composed by Gioachino Rossini. 

William Tell premiered in 1829 and was the last of Rossini's 39 operas, after which he went into semi-retirement, although he continued to compose cantatas, sacred music and secular vocal music. The overture is in four parts, each following without pause.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj William Tell Overture Finale Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Rossini & Liszt - William Tell Overture - No.4
tracks.description:
The William Tell Overture is the overture to the opera William Tell (original French title Guillaume Tell), whose music was composed by Gioachino Rossini. 

William Tell premiered in 1829 and was the last of Rossini's 39 operas, after which he went into semi-retirement, although he continued to compose cantatas, sacred music and secular vocal music. The overture is in four parts, each following without pause.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Girl With Flaxen Hair" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Claude Debussy - The Girl With The Flaxen Hair
tracks.description:
La fille aux cheveux de lin is a musical composition by French composer Claude Debussy. It is the eighth of the composer's Préludes, Book I (1909-1910). The title is in French and translates roughly to "The Girl with the Flaxen Hair". 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Für Elise Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Ludvig Van Beethoven - Für Elise
tracks.description:
Bagatelle No. 25 in A minor for solo piano, commonly known as "Für Elise" or "Fuer Elise"  commonly misspelled "Fur Elise", is one of Ludwig van Beethoven's most popular compositions. It is usually classified as a bagatelle, but it is also sometimes referred to as an Albumblatt.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Magic Fire Scene Valkerie Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Richard Wagner - The Valkerie
tracks.description:
The Ride of the Valkyries is the popular term for the beginning of Act III of Die Walküre, the second of the four operas by Richard Wagner that constitute Der Ring des Nibelungen. 

The main theme of the Ride, the leitmotif labelled Walkürenritt, was first written down by the composer on 23 July 1851. The preliminary draft for the Ride was composed in 1854 as part of the composition of the entire opera, which was fully orchestrated by the end of the first quarter of 1856. 

Together with the Bridal Chorus from Lohengrin, the Ride of the Valkyries is one of Wagner's best-known pieces.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Liebestraum Nocturne No.3 Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Franz Liszt - Liebestraum Nocturne No.3
tracks.description:
Liebesträume (German for Dreams of Love) is a set of three solo piano works by Franz Liszt, published in 1850. 

Originally the three Liebesträume were conceived as lieder after poems by Ludwig Uhland and Ferdinand Freiligrath. In 1850, two versions appeared simultaneously as a set of songs for high voice and piano, and as transcriptions for piano two-hands.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Swan Lake" Danse Hongroise Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Tchaikovsky - Swan Lake - Danse Hongroise
tracks.description:
Swan Lake Op. 20, is a ballet composed by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky in 1875--1876. The scenario, initially in four acts, was fashioned from Russian folk tales and tells the story of Odette, a princess turned into a swan by an evil sorcerer's curse. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Andante Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Franz Schubert - Andante In C Major
tracks.description: Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Classical Music Masters" Manuetto Trio Serenade Classical Music The Essential Collection
tracks.title: Mozart - Manuetto E Trio - Serenade
tracks.description: Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Grande Valse Brillante Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Grande Valse Brillante
tracks.description:
The Grande Valse Brillante was composed by Frédéric Chopin in 1833 and published in 1834. This was his first published waltz composition for solo piano, although prior to 1834 he had written at least sixteen waltzes that were either destroyed or eventually published posthumously.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Classical Music The Masters" Scherzo Op.31
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Scherzo Op.31 - No.2
tracks.description:
The Scherzo No. 2 in B-flat minor, Op. 31 is a scherzo by Frédéric Chopin. The work was composed and published in 1837, and was dedicated to Countess Adèle Fürstenstein. Schumann compared this scherzo to a Byronic poem, "so overflowing with tenderness, boldness, love and contempt." 

Classical Music - The Masters

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Tombeau Couperin Suite Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Le Tombeau de Couperin Suite - Menuet
tracks.description:
Le tombeau de Couperin is a suite for solo piano by Maurice Ravel, composed between 1914 and 1917, in six movements based on those of a traditional Baroque suite. 

Each movement is dedicated to the memory of a friend of the composer (or in one case, two brothers) who had died fighting in World War I. Ravel also produced an orchestral version of the work in 1919, although this omitted two of the original movements.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Franz Liszt" Remixdj Hungarian Rhapsody
tracks.title: Franz Liszt - Hungarian Rhapsody
tracks.description:
Hungarian Rhapsody No. 2, is the second in a set of 19 Hungarian Rhapsodies by composer Franz Liszt, and is by far the most famous of the set. 

Few other piano solos have achieved such widespread popularity, offering the pianist the opportunity to reveal exceptional skill as a virtuoso, while providing the listener with an immediate and irresistible musical appeal.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Haydn Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Haydn - Andante With Variations Expt.
tracks.description:
The Andante with variations in F minor, also known as Un piccolo divertimento, was composed for piano by Joseph Haydn in 1793, and is among his most popular piano works. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Claude Debussy" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Claude Debussy - Rêverie
tracks.description:
Written in 1890, Debussy's Reverie was one of his first solo piano works to make an impact. Even at this early stage in his career, when he was still working out what kind of composer he wanted to be (he was apparently a fervent debater when it came to Wagnerism), it's clear to see traits of that signature Debussy sound.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Edvard Grieg" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Edvard Grieg - Hall Of The Mointain King
tracks.description:
"In the Hall of the Mountain King" is a piece of orchestral music composed by Edvard Grieg for the sixth scene of act 2 in Henrik Ibsen's 1867 play Peer Gynt. It was originally part of Opus 23 but was later extracted as the final piece of Peer Gynt, Suite No. 1, Op. 46.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Frederic Chopin" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Revolutionary Étude
tracks.description:
Étude Op. 10, No. 12 in C minor, known as the Revolutionary Étude or the Étude on the Bombardment of Warsaw,[1] is a solo piano work by Frédéric Chopin written circa 1831, and the last in his first set, Etudes Op.10, dedicated "à son ami Franz Liszt" ("to his friend Franz Liszt").

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Maurice Ravel" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Ravel - Miroirs 3 - Une Barque Sur L'Océan
tracks.description:
Miroirs is a suite for solo piano written by French composer Maurice Ravel between 1904 and 1905. First performed by Ricardo Viñes in 1906, Miroirs contains five movements, each dedicated to a fellow member of the French avant-garde artist group, Les Apaches.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj Haydn Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Joseph Haydn - Sonata No.52 - No.1
tracks.description:
The Piano Sonata No. 52 in E-flat major, Hob. XVI/52, L. 62, was written in 1794 by Joseph Haydn. This is the last of Haydn's piano sonatas, and is widely considered his greatest. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Erik Satie" Remixdj Masters Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Erik Satie - Je Te Veux
tracks.description:
"Je te veux" (French for I want you) is a song composed by Erik Satie to a text by Henry Pacory. A sentimental waltz, it was written for Paulette Darty, whose accompanist Satie had been for a period of time. The text consists of two verses and a repeated chorus.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Erik Satie" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Erik Satie - Gymnopédie No.3
tracks.description:
These short, atmospheric pieces are written in 3/4 time, with each sharing a common theme and structure. Collectively, the Gymnopédies are regarded as an important precursor to modern ambient music.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Frédéric Chopin" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Chopin - Étude Op. 25 - No.1
tracks.description:
Étude Op. 25, No. 1 in A-flat major is a solo piano work composed by Frédéric Chopin in 1836, and published in 1837. The work consists entirely of rapid arpeggios and harmonic modulations based on A-flat major.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Maurice Ravel" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Maurice Ravel - Bolero
tracks.description:
Boléro is a one-movement orchestral piece by Maurice Ravel (1875--1937). Originally composed as a ballet commissioned by Russian actress and dancer Ida Rubinstein, the piece, which premiered in 1928, is Ravel's most famous musical composition.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Canon in D Major" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Johann Pachelbel - Canon In D Major
tracks.description:
Pachelbel's Canon is the name commonly given to a canon by the German Baroque composer Johann Pachelbel in his Canon and Gigue for 3 violins and basso continuo.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Remixdj "Frederic Chopin" Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Chopin - Valses Nobles & Sentimentales Expt.
tracks.description:
The Valses nobles et sentimentales is a suite of waltzes composed by Maurice Ravel. The piano version was published in 1911, and an orchestral version was published in 1912. 

The title was chosen in homage to Franz Schubert, who had released collections of waltzes in 1823 entitled Valses nobles and Valses sentimentales. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Frederic Chopin" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Raindrop Prelude
tracks.description:
The Prelude Op. 28, No. 15, by Frédéric Chopin, known as the "Raindrop" prelude, is one of the 24 Chopin preludes. Usually lasting between five and seven minutes, this is the longest of the preludes. The prelude is noted for its repeating A-flat, which appears throughout the piece and sounds like raindrops to many listeners.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Moment aux" Remixdj Music Classical Essential Collection
tracks.title: Franz Schubert - Moment Musicaux - No.1
tracks.description:
Six Moments Musicaux, is a collection of six short pieces for solo piano composed by Franz Schubert. 

Along with the Impromptus, they are among the most frequently played of all Schubert's piano music, and have been recorded many times. No. 3 in F minor has been arranged by Leopold Godowsky and others.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Maurice Ravel Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Maurice Ravel - Sonatine
tracks.description:
Sonatine is a piano work written by Maurice Ravel. Although Ravel wrote in his autobiography that he wrote the Sonatine after his piano suite Miroirs, it seems to have been written between 1903 and 1905. He most likely referred to the dates he finished both of the works.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: Ravel Maurice Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Maurice Ravel - Jeux D'eau
tracks.description:
Jeux d'eau is a piece for solo piano by Maurice Ravel. The title is often translated as 'Fountains', 'Water Games', or 'Playing water'. At the time of writing, Ravel was a student of Gabriel Fauré, to whom the piece is dedicated. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Erik Satie" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Erik Satie - Gnossienne No.1
tracks.description:
Gnossienne was a word that did not exist before Satie used it as a title for a composition. The word appears to be derived from "gnosis"; Satie was involved in gnostic sects and movements at the time that he began to compose the Gnossiennes.

However, some published versions claim that the word derives from Cretan "knossos" or "gnossus"; this interpretation supports the theory linking the Gnossiennes to the myth of Theseus, Ariadne and the Minotaur. 

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

tracks.tag_list: "Frédéric Chopin" Remixdj Classical Music Essential Collection
tracks.title: Frédéric Chopin - Funeral March
tracks.description:
Chopin's Funeral March first appeared in the 1830s. It was the third movement in his Sonata No. 2 in B-flat Minor — a stunning, haunting work.

Classical Music - The Essential Collection

title: Classical Music - The Essential Collection
